artist: Artist: Attributed to Jacques de Gheyn III; Artist: Formerly attributed to Jacques de Gheyn II
description: portrait of head and shoulder of a man with medium-length curly hair and a short beard looking out of picture plane; man wears a hat and a neckerchief tied in a bow
provenance: Sale, Sotheby's, London, November 21, 1979, no. 78, as by Agostino Carracci, for £330, to Moir]; Alfred Moir, Santa Barbara (1979-d. 2010; bequeathed to MIA)
title: Portrait of a Man Wearing a Hat
